::: Hell Beast ::: Ah, Rampage, you can take Inferno and Tankkor and repair 
some of the Auto-guns. I have to go meet with Liono Prime...

::: He gets up and departs from the base and lands within sight range of 
Liono Prme ::: 

::: Hell Beast ::: Liono Prime, I am not armed and I am ready to talk.

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Gremlin, Marine, Black Aracnia, Pheniox, Jackle, and Megatron all wait 
within the Predacon ship, armed and rearing to fight. They maintain the 
computers and keep vigil. :::
